data.meta_description: Watch all of your favorite Bravo shows straight from the Bravo app! Stream full episodes and live TV from The Real Housewives, Below Deck, Vanderpump Rules, Proâ¦
data.text:
Watch all of your favorite Bravo shows straight from the Bravo app! Stream full episodes and live TV from The Real Housewives, Below Deck, Vanderpump Rules, Project Runway, Million Dollar Listing AND MUCH MORE.

Watch the most recent episodes of your favorite shows or watch live TV with the Bravo app. Catch up with live TV and past seasons anytime, anywhere!

Live stream TV from your phone or tablet and catch up on the latest seasons of your favorite shows. Get started by signing in with your TV provider (cable, satellite or digital). The Bravo app supports most TV providers, including DirecTV, Xfinity, Spectrum, AT&T and Verizon.

Sign up for an NBCUniversal Profile within the app using your Google, Apple ID or email account and receive three credits to watch shows for free before signing in with your TV provider. Live stream your favorite shows and sync them across all your devices to continue watching right where you left off.

Watch now to catch the latest episodes of your favorite shows on the Bravo app today!

BRAVO APP FEATURES:

Watch Bravo Shows

â¢ Stream full episodes of your favorite Bravo shows.

â¢ Watch episodes of The Real Housewives of Potomac and The Real Housewives of Salt Lake City

â¢ Live stream your favorite shows like Below Deck, Watch What Happens Live and so much more!

Stream Episodes Your Way

â¢ Watch episodes of new Bravo shows the day after they air on TV.

â¢ Watch shows by signing in with your TV provider and access the entire catalog of VOD and live content.

â¢ Live stream TV and access schedule 24/7.

â¢ Chromecast and AirPlay compatible! Start episodes in the app and stream to your TV.

â¢ TV on the go! If you can't finish an episode in one sitting, the Bravo app saves your place so you can resume watching later.

â¢ Watch TV and mark shows as your Favorites for quick access to the latest episodes.

NBCUniversal Content

â¢ Watch NBC shows on demand from the NBCUniversal family of networks (including NBC, E!, USA, SYFY, Oxygen, MSNBC, CNBC, Universal Kids, Universo and Telemundo).

â¢ Live stream NBCUniversal networks within the app.

â¢ Watch shows and filter by network and genre while browsing.

NBCUniversal Profile

â¢ Create an NBCUniversal Profile to save shows across all your devices.

â¢ Live stream your favorite shows and continue where you left off on any device.

â¢ Watch shows for FREE with three credits when you sign up!

COMMENTS OR QUESTIONS?

Please reach out to iOS@nbcuapps.zendesk.com for assistance.

Please note: Use of the app is limited to the United States and its territories. Video is accessible via 3G, 4G, LTE and Wi-Fi networks. Data charges may apply.

Privacy Policy: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy?brandA=Bravo&intake=Bravo

Your Privacy Choices: Do Not Sell My Personal Information | NBCUNIVERSAL MEDIA

CA Notice: California Notice | NBCUNIVERSAL MEDIA

This app features Nielsenâs proprietary measurement software which contributes to market research, like Nielsenâs TV Ratings. Please see https://sites.nielsen.com/priv/browser/us/en/optout.html for more information

To learn more about our digital measurement products and your choices in regard to them, please visit Digital Measurement Privacy Statement for more information.

PenelopeJ$$ ,

Erica

You guys must have heard something that I missed somewhere. If I wanted to protect my husband, who is a high profile attorney and elderly plus did not sign on to the show, I wouldnât have said anything about a head injury, etc. I donât understand the, son thing, flipping a car and snow, what happened but heâs ok thatâs all that matters. Plus with him being as old as he is I wouldnât have wanted him put under to fix his ankle bc that would have hit the news. But maybe itâs bc she is my favorite but regardless. I donât think she had any idea over the fraudulent chargers being brought against him. She probably signed papers not knowing what they were for. Plus, would you or anyone get on national tv and say my husband is 80 but he has 3 mistresses? I wouldnât. I would do what she did has done talked about how wonderful things were so the women in question know Iâm not going anywhere any time soon. But imagine what it does to your self esteem being young and beautiful yet you still wasnât enough to keep him at home. The Boyfriend thing? I hope she has a dozen of them you go girl!!! But what we as fans should realize is she could have quit the show but didnât. But we have to realize all these questions we ask SHE CANNOT ANSWER bc it can and will be used against her. So, cut her a little, no how about a lot of slack. I would say she was advised to quit but she sucked it up, put her big girl panties on and stayed. Thank you for showing up for your fans Erica!!!
